text:
Glenn Fredly Deviano Latuihamallo (30 September 1975 – 8 April 2020), known professionally as Glenn Fredly, was an Indonesian R&B singer-songwriter, record producer and guitarist. He released more than 10 albums. He produced '. In 2013, he served as a coach for "The Voice Indonesia". He was born in Jakarta.
In 1995, he won the Cipta Pesona Bintang singing contest. In 1996, he was a finalist in the Asia Song Festival. In 2014, he produced the movie '.
Fredly died on 8 April 2020 at the age of 44 in Jakarta of meningitis.
